headline.main: AP Interview: Russian Protester Decries Prison Conditions
headline.print_headline: AP Interview: Russian Protester Decries Prison Conditions

lead_paragraph: Newly free after more than a year in prison, Russian opposition activist Ildar Dadin described beatings and other harsh treatment he says that he endured behind bars. He said that it drove him to thoughts of suicide, but that he overcame the despair through belief in his own integrity.
